title: News from Integrative Medical Institute of Orange County
author: Gary Ruelas; D O; Ph D
description: Keep with the Integrative Medical Institute of Orange County news, updates, posts by staff members and articles from Dr. Gary Ruelas.

cleaned_text: April 2020 - The Milton H. Erickson Foundation Newsletter Read the latest Volume of the The Milton H. Erickson Foundation Newsletter [read more](https://integrative-med.org/april-2020-the-milton-h-erickson-foundation-newsletter/) When our child begins to change and may be in a decline, we worry, our fears may emerge into a panic and when the decline continues and becomes worse, we seek help. IMI is excited to announce the launch of our INFUSION BOOST MENU! "NOBODY SEES ME anymore. I once was someone. . . But somewhere along this journey in life, everyone lost me." Continuing with our community discussion series "Enhance your life through communication" We are really excited to announce this months Dr. Gary Ruelas, D.O., Ph.D. will be speaking on the topic... Read the latest second Volume of the The Milton H. Erickson Foundation Newsletter Often, we go through challenges in our lives that create great turbulence, a disruption of sorts, that may cause discomfort, anxiety and even pain. Harmonizing the brain may be the underlying treatment for addiction, depression, anxiety, learning and developmental disorders, as studies have shown that imbalances and disharmony of this organ are associated with various mental health conditions. Can we stop the progression of brain aging or slow down the incidence of Dementia or Alzheimer's disease in woman? Come listen to a free lecture on brain disease prevention 5/23/2018 at IMI.
